column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Toph says : " Rock - like ! "
#Text=Toph says : " Rock - like ! "
#Text=Sokka says : " You 're awfully cute , but unfortunately you 're made of meat .
#Text=It is not fueled by rage or emotion the way other firebending is .
#Text=Some call lightning the cold - blooded fire .
#Text=It is precise and deadly , like Azula .
#Text=To perform the technique requires peace of mind .
#Text=" Zuko says : " I see .
#Text=That 's why we 're drinking tea , to calm the mind .
#Text=" Iroh says : " Oh yeah , good point !
#Text=I mean , yes .
#Text=There is energy all around us .
#Text=The energy is both yin and yang .
#Text=Positive energy and negative energy .
#Text=Only a select few firebenders can separate these energies .
#Text=This creates an imbalance .
#Text=The energy wants to restore balance , and in a moment the positive and negative energy come crashing back together , you provide release and guidance , creating lightning .
#Text=" Zuko says : " I 'm ready to try it !
#Text=" Iroh says : " Remember , once you separate the energy , you do not command it .
#Text=You are simply its humble guide .
#Text=Breathe first .
#Text=" Toph says : " This time we 're going to try something a little different .
#Text=Instead of moving a rock , you 're going to stop a rock .
#Text=Get in your horse stance !
#Text=I 'm going to roll that boulder down at you .
#Text=If you have the attitude of an earthbender , you 'll stay in your stance and stop the rock .
#Text=Like this !
#Text=" Katara says : " Sorry Toph , but are you really sure this is the way to teach Aang earthbending ?
#Text=" Toph says : " I 'm glad you said something .
#Text=Actually there is a better way .
#Text=This way , you 'll actually have to sense the vibrations of the boulder to stop it .
#Text=Thank you , Katara .
#Text=" Aang says : " Yeah , thanks , Katara !
#Text=" Katara says : " Heh .
#Text="
